articles.description: She appeared on Sunday's Match of the Day 2 show alongside presenter Mark Chapman and fellow pundit Danny Murphy to analyse the day's Premier League games.
articles.content:
Karen Carney has returned to the screen as a pundit following the vile sexist abuse she received online.
She appeared on Sunday's Match of the Day 2 show alongside presenter Mark Chapman and fellow … [+1492 chars]

articles.author: Connor Dunn
articles.title: Jurgen Klopp outlines Liverpool position in January transfer window - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: Virgil van Dijk, Joe Gomez and Joel Matip are all out injured and there are calls for Liverpool to enter the transfer market to bolster their squad
articles.content:
Jurgen Klopp "doesn't know" whether Liverpool can complete any transfers in the January market.
The Reds boss explained that it is a "very difficult window" for clubs and that he has solutions among… [+3138 chars]

articles.title: MARTIN SAMUEL: Arrogant footballers' lockdown rule-breaking must be stopped or game faces shutdown - Daily Mail
articles.description: MARTIN SAMUEL - CHIEF SPORTS WRITER:    It's idiocy to post photos and place illegal events in the public domain. Everyone involved must have known what they were doing was wrong.
